name: Rubber Chicken of Doom
description: This weapon causes spontaneous laughter, which can be dangerous if used near cliffs.

name: Feathered Sword of Tickling
description: One swipe and your enemies will be reduced to giggling puddles of helplessness.

name: Banana Peel Slingshot
description: It’s more annoying than deadly, but slipping on it is inevitable.

name: The Spork of Eternal Confusion
description: Fork? Spoon? Both? No one knows, and that’s where the confusion begins.

name: Accordion of Annihilation
description: Its awful sound is said to have caused entire armies to flee without a fight.

name: The Pillow of Smothering Softness
description: So soft, it’ll put anyone into a deep sleep, but they might wake up 10 years later.

name: Cactus Club
description: It’s sharp and painful, but it also waters itself.

name: The Sock Cannon
description: Fires socks at enemies, leaving them confused and slightly annoyed by mismatched pairs.

name: Exploding Whoopee Cushion
description: You laugh at first, then it explodes, and suddenly it’s not so funny anymore.

name: The Hairdryer of Infinite Wind
description: It blows so hard, it can knock down trees or just give you the best hair day ever.
